==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|なか|す|yomi=kun}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=なかす|中|tr1=naka|t1=middle, center|州|tr2=su|t2=sandbank}}.<ref>{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|な|かす}}<ref>{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[na̠ka̠sɯᵝ]}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|中洲}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|なかす}}

# a [[sandbank]] in a river

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|ちゅう|しゅう|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ちゅうしゅう}} compound {{m|ltc|中州|tr=*djiung *jiou}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|中州|tr=zhōngzhōu}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|ちゅ|うしゅう}}<ref name="DJR"/>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[t͡ɕʲɯᵝːɕʲɯᵝː]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ちゅうしゅう|hhira=ちゆうしう}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=ちゅうしゅう}} the central location of some larger geographic area

====Proper noun====
